title: How to Get a Good Future in Sonic CD

steps.headline: Go to any round from the game.
steps.description: It doesn't matter which round, but it must be the first zone from it in order to get a Good Future.

steps.headline: Hit a "Past" sign.
steps.description: A "Past" sign will be also added to the life counter.

steps.headline: Find a good place to run fast.
steps.description: Running fast enough until your character sparkles and jumping will result in a successful time-travel.

steps.headline: Locate and destroy the robot generators.
steps.description: Those become trickier to find in later rounds.

steps.headline: Finish the level and repeat the traveling process.
steps.description: Advance into the next zone and you will have a Good Future.

text: Go to any round from the game. It doesn't matter which round, but it must be the first zone from it in order to get a Good Future. Hit a "Past" sign. A "Past" sign will be also added to the life counter. Find a good place to run fast. Running fast enough until your character sparkles and jumping will result in a successful time-travel. Locate and destroy the robot generators. Those become trickier to find in later rounds. Finish the level and repeat the traveling process. Advance into the next zone and you will have a Good Future.
